name: The Beneath Ore Index

pages.text: This is the $(thing)Ore Index$() for $(thing)The Beneath$(). All ores are sorted alphabetically and then by richest to poorest vein type. You can click on them to learn more information about each vein.
pages.title: The Beneath Ore Index
